metadata.title: CVE-2024-27071 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:backlight: hx8357: Fix potential NULL pointer dereferenceThe "im" pins are optional. Add missing check in the hx8357_probe().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
